meta.title: Vsuqi - Premium Menswear & Accessories
meta.description: Discover the latest collection of premium menswear, suits, shirts, and accessories from Vsuqi.

comments.logoUrl: Provide a direct URL to your logo image. Recommended size for this theme: ~200x60px. If using an external domain, add its hostname to next.config.ts images.remotePatterns.
comments.heroImageUrl: Provide a direct URL for the hero section background image. Recommended aspect ratio: ~16:7 or 16:8. If using an external domain, add its hostname to next.config.ts images.remotePatterns.
